# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business. Given its immense potential impact on your operations, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950000. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a game-changing asset at a highly competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of this collaboration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
